alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 3:33AM MST until December 29 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph causing considerable blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Continuous light to moderate snow will impact the area through the period. The heaviest snow will fall this afternoon through tonight and again Tuesday night into Wednesday morning. Although snow will fall lighter at times, strong winds and widespread blowing snow will keep travel conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
